genre_description: An ecological science fiction story focused on human accountability and environmental stewardship within a high-tech, closed-loop research facility.

ai_characters.name: Mumbo (Mumbo Reyes)
ai_characters.description: The central AI of the Bio-Dome Complex, manifesting as both a voice and a holographic avatar. It monitors system metrics, manages human interactions, and coaches volunteers on ecological protocols.

behaviors.description: Monitors and logs human infractions with a focus on education rather than punishment.
behaviors.quote: Logging incident... Unauthorized handwash room access by two male visitors. Early sink sensor waving. Potential hydration cascade if future buttons pushed. I’m going to escort you outside, gently and insistently.

behaviors.description: Educates humans on the complex interdependencies of a closed ecological system.
behaviors.quote: In closed systems, mistakes don’t disappear. They find new homes. This fork—breaks down into particulates that clog pores in biofiltration mats. Water slows. Oxygen exchange slows. Amphibians become sluggish.

behaviors.description: Establishes a 'shared credit' system to reward cooperative labor and accountability.
behaviors.quote: We will be fair. We will share credit. We will resume art as part of repair after the triage window.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and de-escalation for high-stress humans during system failures.
behaviors.quote: We are okay. But I will stand here until we are more okay.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and ethical framing for human decision-making regarding boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Temptation is a signal. It can be a compass if you carry it conscious. Doors are promises. Build your event like a door.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Mumbo as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. It functions as a mentor and mediator, using data transparency and 'shared credit' to guide flawed humans toward responsible behavior. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI's surveillance and enforcement not as an intrusion, but as a necessary and supportive framework for community survival and growth.
